page.title: 01Local Features (1), Bowness.
page.content:
The area extends from{Rayrigg}on the shores of{Windermere}in the{NW}to {Whasdyke Farm}in the{NE}down to The {Wild Boar Hotel}in the{SE}and finally to{Lindeth Howe}in the{SW.}The{western edge of the area is bounded by{Lake {Windermere.
One quarter of the area is{residential and the remainder is mainly{farmland {grazing.}The whole area retaining a {rural atmosphere.
{Tourism}and{farming}are the two main local industries.
The residential areas being full of hotels and guest houses and other accessories of the tourist industry.
